isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO SERIES - INSTALL - REAR AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR

svcproc.title: REAR AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR
svcproc.para: Make sure to use an auxiliary drive gear retaining bolt with thread sealant material.

Due to a design change some models may have a round retainer that holds the rear auxiliary drive gear in position. Along with the round retainer there will be two (2) thrust washers, one (1) behind the retainer and one (1) behind the rear auxiliary driver gear.

step1.para: On the output shaft front, with clutching teeth facing forward, install one thrust washer (if the assembly has a round retainer) and the rear auxiliary drive gear ( Figure 228).
With the retainer pin facing the rear auxiliary drive gear, match the pin with the gear pin hole and install the thrust washer (if the assembly has a round retainer) and retainer ( Figure 229).

figure.caption: Figure 229. Match The Pin With The Gear Pin Hole

step1.para: Finger tighten the retainer bolt ( Figure 229).
Temporarily install the output yoke. To keep the output shaft from turning, insert and hold the breaker bar ( Figure 230).
Tighten the auxiliary drive gear retainer bolt to 90 to 120 ft-lbs. (122 to 163 N•m) of torque ( Figure 231). Remove the breaker bar and output yoke.

figure.caption: Figure 231. Tighten Auxiliary Drive Gear Retainer Bolt
